"گوشی درحال فعال کردن خدمات اینترنت همراه شما است.
ممکن است تا 5 دقیقه زمان ببرد."
راهنمای گفته شده را دنبال کرده تا زمانی که بشنوید فعال‌سازی کامل شد.

اگر از مرحله فعال سازی رد شوید، شما قادر به برقراری تماس یا اتصال به شبکه‌های اینترنت همراه نخواهید بود (با این حال می‌توانید به شبکه‌های Wi-Fi مصل شوید). تا زمانی که گوشی خود را فعال کنید، هر بار که آن را روشن می کنید از شما خواسته می شود که آن را فعال کنید.
گوشی شما فعال نشده است. ممکن است تا آغاز خدمات تا ۱۵ دقیقه زمان ببرد.

"یک تماس مخصوص باید برای فعال‌سازی تلفن شما برقرار شود.
پس از فشار دادن “Activate”، به راهنمای های مربوطه گوش داده تا بتوانید گوشی خود را فعال کنید."

"تلفن شما فعال نشد. شما باید ناحیه‌ای با پوشش بهتر پیدا کنید (نزدیک یک پنجره یا بیرون).
دوباره امتحان کنید و یا برای گزینه‌های بیشتر با مرکز خدمات مشتریان تماس بگیرید."

این زبان به یک اتصال شبکه فعال برای خروجی نوشتار به گفتار نیاز دارد.

این موتور ترکیب صوتی ممکن است بتواند تمام متن گفته شده را جمع‌آوری کند، از جمله اطلاعات شخصی مانند رمزهای ورود و شماره‌های کارت اعتباری. این کارها توسط موتور%s انجام می‌شود. استفاده از این موتور ترکیب صوتی را فعال می‌کنید؟

Turn on to be able to use VoLTE call functionality in VoLTE networks

"This tablet supports VoLTE calls in 4G networks. Make sure the networks that your device is connected to support this functionality. VoLTE services are provided by your carrier. Contact your local carrier to learn whether VoLTE is supported in your area.
If you see _ in your status bar, VoLTE calls aren't available. If you can't make or receive calls, or your calls are interrupted, make sure your network is compatible with VoLTE.
This tablet doesn't have an earpiece. You can switch to hands-free mode or use earphones to make calls."
VoLTE calls provide better quality than regular calls. Send SMS to activate?

Confirm that your carrier supports this feature before turning on. Otherwise, regular calls might be affected.
China Telecom VoLTE services are only provided in the areas with VoLTE network coverage. VoLTE services are provided by the carrier.
Emergency calls in areas with cellular coverage only

"Emergency calls are not possible via WLAN Calling.
The device switches automatically to a cellular network(2G/3G) to place an emergency call.
Emergency calls are only possible in areas with cellular coverage."

"You can make calls using WLAN now. If you're connected to a WLAN network, you'll be able to talk even when you're in the areas with no mobile network coverage."

"WLAN Calling is a service provided by Orange that allows you to make and receive calls via WLAN. This feature can be used in areas with poor mobile network coverage.
To use WLAN Calling, turn it on in Settings > WLAN Calling.
To activate the service, Orange will send you a confirmation message as soon as the service is available. After this, you'll be able to connect to a WLAN network and make calls.
Calls made via WLAN will be charged according to the conditions of your plan.
Whenever this feature is available, the following icon will be shown at the top of your screen."

"If you select to prefer WLAN networks, they'll be used by default to make phone calls. In case you aren't connected to WLAN or the signal is poor, mobile networks will be used to make calls.
If you select to prefer mobile networks, they will be used by default to make phone calls. In case there's no mobile network coverage or the signal is poor, WLAN networks will be used instead."
"This service is provided by Orange. It might take several hours to activate this service. You'll receive a confirmation SMS as soon as it's available."
"If you select to prefer mobile networks, mobile networks will be used for calls by default. In case when there's no mobile network signal or it's very poor, WLAN network will be used instead."
